mapper.select: SELECT A.f_id, B.u_nickname, B.u_profile_pic FROM (SELECT f_id, u_id FROM follow WHERE u_id = #{u_id}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN member B ON A.f_id = B.u_id
SELECT A.uf_id, B.u_nickname, B.u_profile_pic FROM (SELECT uf_id, u_id FROM un_follow WHERE u_id = #{u_id}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN member B ON A.uf_id = B.u_id
SELECT A.f_id, B.u_nickname, B.u_profile_pic FROM (SELECT f_id, u_id FROM follow WHERE f_id = #{u_id}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN member B ON A.u_id = B.u_id

SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 as ranking, B.u_id, B.u_nickname, B.u_profile_pic, A.follower_count FROM (SELECT f_id, COUNT(*) AS follower_count FROM follow GROUP BY f_id ORDER BY follower_count desc) A LEFT OUTER JOIN member B ON A.f_id = B.u_id, (SELECT @rownum := 0) rownum LIMIT 9
